name: ksrtc
description: Supporting code for Programming WebRTC: Build Real-Time Streaming Applications for the Web. Pragmatic Programmers, 2023.
author: Karl Stolley <karl.stolley@gmail.com> (https://stolley.dev/)

scripts.start:demos: cross-env LOCALHOST_SSL_CERT=Certs/localhost.crt cross-env LOCALHOST_SSL_KEY=Certs/localhost.key cross-env PUBLIC=demos cross-env DEBUG=signaling-server: node ./scripts/start-server
scripts.ssl-keys: cross-env MSYS_NO_PATHCONV=1 openssl req -x509 -out Certs/localhost.crt -keyout Certs/localhost.key -newkey rsa:2048 -nodes -sha256 -days 10 -subj '/CN=localhost/' -extensions EXT -config scripts/conf/self-signed.conf
scripts.lint: npm run lint:node && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:html
scripts.lint:node: npx eslint -c scripts/conf/.eslint.node.json server.js scripts/start-server demos/tests
